ygData.subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: Okay, read below, and if RgDaN doesn t reply soon, my characters will just waltz right in... The People s Group walk up to the base and the autoguns fire.

Okay, read below, and if RgDaN doesn't reply soon, my characters will just
waltz right in...

The People's Group walk up to the base and the autoguns fire. Airbomber
blocks the blast and then destroys the autogun. Plintissa knew something was
wrong, the autoguns shouldn't be firing at Maximals! Plintissa called Liono
Prime on her commlink.

"Excuse me, but why is the base firing at me and my group, Liono? We have
come to the base to bring some allies, the predacons attacked my group when
we went to see what that Maximal wanabe Suukie was doing. So let's just fix
this problem, okay?" Plintissa asked, very annoyed at the fact that some
worthless people like Liono would turn the autoguns on them. Plintissa
called Iron Raptor.

"Hey, Iron Raptor, Plintissa here, I got problems, the base is firing at me
and the one thing Dracona doesn't have is med kits, we need to borrow a few
until Dracona gets the technology to build some, please turn the autoguns
off of us." Plintissa said. Plintissa wanted to see Iron Raptor again as
well, and waited very impatiently with her angry group rallying behind her.
Another autogun fired at her and she stumbled backwards, avoiding the shot,
it continued firing and Stranato took aim, blasting the autogun right into
the shields, melting it. Plintissa waited...
----- Original Message -----
From: <KSLawdogg@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Tuesday, June 13, 2000 10:34 AM
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


> (Code, sorry, I am just "preaching the message" as it were.  Liono is in
> control of the Ark as far as I know, and I KNOW he put all of the People's
> group on enemy.  So you can't just waltz right in.  If your guys want to
be
> Maximal, work it out with Liono.  He doesn't seem to want to be allies
with
> your People's Group, and he's set the defenses to monitor you as enemy.
So
> if you come in range, you will be shot and you wouldn't be let inside
unless
> someone opened them.  That's all I know.  Discuss it with Liono, not
myself)
